name: Apocablocalypse
description:
Surviving in the city has never been easy, but with zombies? Survival is top priority as you fight through the streets gathering new weapons and powers to help fellow survivors and try to live to see tomorrow!

We made this game over a 3 month period for a 3D Game Design Class so enjoy what systems we got done in time!

CREDITS

Craig Ross - Programmer and Weapons Specialist

Joshua Titus - Programmer and Quest Master

Christopher Rollins - Project Lead, Programmer and Cat Herder
